## FieldVariable.fromXml() method

Initialize this field based on the given XML.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fieldElement | Element | The element containing information about the variable field's state. |
